translation: First, in the east (seven), there was a ray of light, two suspicious thoughts, three questions in common, four inquiries into the light, five offerings, six requests for explanation of the teaching, and seven Buddha's silent approval; second, in the southeast (seven), there was a ray of light, two suspicious thoughts, three questions in common, four inquiries into the light, five offerings, six requests for explanation of the teaching, and seven Buddha's silent approval; third, in the south (seven), there was a ray of light, two suspicious thoughts, three questions in common, four inquiries into the light, five offerings, six requests for explanation of the teaching, and four Buddha's silent approval; fourth, in general, there were six directions and two higher (six), there was a ray of light, two suspicious thoughts, three questions in common, four inquiries into the light, five offerings, six requests for explanation of the teaching, and two Buddha's silent approval.
